about_the_game: The E1 first arrived on Viennese streets in 1966, and while similar in appearance to their Type E predecessors, they came equipped with a much powerful motor. 338 of these iconic trams made the Vienna their own for over forty years, with the last E1 tram withdrawn from service in 2022. The E1 could also be found in Rotterdam and across Silesia in Poland.
detailed_description: The E1 first arrived on Viennese streets in 1966, and while similar in appearance to their Type E predecessors, they came equipped with a much powerful motor. 338 of these iconic trams made the Vienna their own for over forty years, with the last E1 tram withdrawn from service in 2022. The E1 could also be found in Rotterdam and across Silesia in Poland.
